main event: An unidentified fast-moving target was observed by the USAF facility at Bradley Field on radar while approaching Pittsfield, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The radar detected a target approximately 12 miles away that closed to about 3 miles from the aircraft before pulling away,The aircraft crew observed white and flashing green lights from the target,The light intensity was reported to be several times brighter than stars,The altitude of the object was unknown,The incident involved both visual and radar observations.
witness description: USAF facility crew at Bradley Field
